statements: SELECT * FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, executed_date FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agreement_name, parties->'seller' FROM legal_agreements WHERE executed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_name, contract_address FROM legal_agreements WHERE contract_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agreement_name, executed_date FROM legal_agreements ORDER BY executed_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, executed_date FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_name LIKE 'Co%' ORDER BY executed_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_id = '2b0a93b6-1358-4a49-91ef-47bd4a6f0516'
SELECT agreement_id, parties->'party_name' AS party_name, contract_address FROM legal_agreements WHERE JSONB_EXISTS(parties, 'party_type')
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, executed_date, contract_address FROM legal_agreements WHERE executed_date > '2022-01-01' AND contract_address IS NOT NULL
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, parties->'party_name' AS party_name, executed_date FROM legal_agreements WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(parties->'party_name') > 1 ORDER BY agreement_name ASC
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, party1, party2 FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, agreement_text FROM legal_agreements WHERE party1 = 'Company A';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_text, execution_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, agreement_id FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%service%' ORDER BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements WHERE party1 = 'CompanyA';
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_text FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_name LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements ORDER BY validity_period DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, party1, party2 FROM legal_agreements WHERE validity_period > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, execution_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE execution_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY execution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, party_one, party_two FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, execution_date FROM contracts WHERE is_executed = true;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, party_one FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_id > 5;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT agreement_name, party_two FROM legal_agreements WHERE party_one = 'Company A';
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, parties FROM legal_agreements WHERE agreement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT template_name FROM contract_templates WHERE template_format = 'PDF';
SELECT contract_id, agreement_id, template_id FROM executed_contracts WHERE executed_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_address, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM legal_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, parties FROM legal_agreements WHERE execution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_name, COUNT(*) FROM legal_agreements GROUP BY agreement_name;
SELECT template_name, template_format FROM contract_templates ORDER BY template_format DESC;
SELECT contract_id, template_name, executed_date FROM executed_contracts INNER JOIN contract_templates ON executed_contracts.template_id = contract_templates.template_id;
SELECT * FROM agreements
SELECT agreement_name, signing_date FROM agreements
SELECT party_id, party_name, address FROM parties WHERE party_id = 1
SELECT agreement_name, expiration_date FROM agreements ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT contract_name, creator_party_id, creation_date FROM smart_contracts
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE signing_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT a.agreement_name, p.party_name FROM agreements a JOIN parties p ON a.agreement_id = p.party_id WHERE p.phone_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT agreement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_signatures FROM signatures JOIN agreements ON signatures.agreement_id = agreements.agreement_id GROUP BY agreement_name HAVING total_signatures > 5;
SELECT party_name, COUNT(*) AS total_executions FROM executions JOIN parties ON executions.smart_contract_id = parties.party_id GROUP BY party_name HAVING total_executions < 3;
SELECT contract_name AS Contract, creation_date AS Date FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_party_id = 1 ORDER BY creation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
